content: Just outside the shack, there's a small garden area with yet more Stone Spiders, and a Mushroom you can try to harvest only to reveal a formidable Fungiman instead.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Village_of_Lanxi_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Village of Lanxi Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Estate of the Zhu'.
The content is as follows:
Just outside the shack, there's a small garden area with yet more Stone Spiders, and a Mushroom you can try to harvest only to reveal a formidable Fungiman instead.
